thread.title: Leaked documents reveal how pregnant Cheryl and Liam Payne will announce baby news
thread.title_full: Leaked documents reveal how pregnant Cheryl and Liam Payne will announce baby news

author: Lara Martin
title: Leaked documents reveal how pregnant Cheryl and Liam Payne will announce baby news
text:
Leaked documents reveal how pregnant Cheryl and Liam Payne will announce baby news Popstar Cheryl is expecting her first child with One Direction star boyfriend Liam Payne Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Cheryl FINALLY confirms her pregnancy Share this video   Thank you for subscribing!   
Fans of Cheryl and Liam Payne have been whipped into a frenzy after leaked documents posted to a Twitter fan account appeared to reveal details of the popstar’s birthing plan and how she’ll announce the happy news. 
Some social media accounts dedicated to the famous couple have posted snippets from the documents, ask for privacy and hint that they will make an official announcement when they are ready. 
And as you’d expect, excitement is now growing among fans about the impending arrival of a baby girl or boy. 
“OMG, I’m so excited I could pop!!!” wrote one. 
Another said: “Oh my god!!! I can’t wait, I’m so happy for them.” 
Others, however, have said all along that Cheryl and One Direction's Liam should be left alone to enjoy their newborn baby in private without feeling the need to announce the news to anyone other than their family and friends. 
One wrote: “Cheryl and Liam will say about the baby when they’re ready to and if they don’t it is up to them. It’s their private life.” 
Another said: “They want privacy, respect that… I’d hate to be famous.” 
Cheryl, 33, and 23-year-old Liam have been notoriously tight lipped about their relationship ever since they got together. They’ve rarely appeared in public together or posted joint images to Instagram and have never once spoken about one another in any interview. 
They only confirmed the pregnancy news in February, when Cheryl posed for a photoshoot for Prince’s Trust and L’Oreal showing off her blossoming baby bump. 
Apart from that photo, there's been no other word from the happy couple about their tot, so fans have been left to guess whether it will be a boy or girl and what name might be chosen. 
Referencing One Direction's Louis Tomlinson's baby son Freddie, one fan said: "I'm hoping for a girl since 1D already has a baby boy. Gotta be diverse." 
But another reckoned a boy would be a good thing: "Liam and cheryl will soon become parents. what if theres another baby boy. omg another generation of one direction (sic)." Like us on Facebook
